languages.text: "И я прославляю это, Ваша Светлость! Я тысячекратно благодарю вас за то, что вы освободили меня от моего прежнего владыки! Жизнь при дворе губернатора Искандора... неописуема. Сам {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Имматериум{/g} шепчет идеи новых извращений в его больной разум. Посему, я бесконечно благодарен за избавление от него. Моя жизнь теперь принадлежит вам".

traits.locale_text: "О большем я и мечтать не мог, Ваша Светлость. Жизнь при дворе губернатора Искандера недолговечна и полна ужасов. Никакого варпа не требуется, чтобы сойти с ума от нескончаемых ужасов на яву. Посему, я бесконечно благодарен за вашу помощь. Моя жизнь теперь принадлежит вам".

languages.text: "And that is glorious, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A thousand thanks to you for liberating me from my former master! Living at the court of Governor Iskandor is... indescribable. The {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} itself whispers ideas for new perversions into his disturbed mind. Therefore, I am infinitely grateful to be delivered from him. My life belongs to you now."
languages.original_text: "И я прославляю это, Ваша Светлость! Я тысячекратно благодарю вас за то, что вы освободили меня от моего прежнего владыки! Жизнь при дворе губернатора Искандора... неописуема. Сам {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Имматериум{/g} шепчет идеи новых извращений в его больной разум. Посему, я бесконечно благодарен за избавление от него. Моя жизнь теперь принадлежит вам".

The Immaterium itself whispers ideas for new perversions into his disturbed mind. Therefore I'm infinitely grateful to be delivered from him. My life belongs to you now."

"And that is glorious, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A thousand thanks to you for liberating me from my former master! Living at the court of Governor Iskandor is... indescribable. The {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} itself whispers ideas for new perversions into his disturbed mind. Therefore, I am infinitely grateful to be delivered from him. My life belongs to you now."

languages.text: «¡Y eso es algo glorioso, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Mil gracias por liberarme de mi anterior señor! Vivir en la corte del gobernador Iskandor es... indescriptible. El mismo {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Inmaterio{/g} susurra ideas de nuevas perversiones a su mente perturbada. Por lo tanto, estoy infinitamente agradecido de poder alejarme de él. Mi vida es suya ahora».
languages.original_text: "And that is glorious, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A thousand thanks to you for liberating me from my former master! Living at the court of Governor Iskandor is... indescribable. The {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} itself whispers ideas for new perversions into his disturbed mind. Therefore, I am infinitely grateful to be delivered from him. My life belongs to you now."

traits.locale_text: «¡Y eso es algo glorioso, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Mil gracias por liberarme de mi anterior señor! Vivir en la corte del gobernador Iskandor es... indescriptible. El mismo Inmaterio susurra ideas de nuevas perversiones a su mente perturbada. Por lo tanto, estoy infinitamente agradecido de poder alejarme de él. Mi vida es suya ahora».

languages.text: 「陛下、本当にありがとう！前の主から解放してくださり、心から感謝する！イスカンダル総督の宮廷での暮らしは…何とも言えないものだった。{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}非物質世界{/g}そのものが、荒んだ心に新たな腐敗した提案を囁きかけてくる。なので、それから解放されたことに心の底から感謝している。この命はあなたのものだ」
languages.original_text: "And that is glorious, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A thousand thanks to you for liberating me from my former master! Living at the court of Governor Iskandor is... indescribable. The {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} itself whispers ideas for new perversions into his disturbed mind. Therefore, I am infinitely grateful to be delivered from him. My life belongs to you now."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、本当にありがとう！前の主から解放してくださり、心から感謝する！イスカンダル総督の宮廷での暮らしは…何とも言えないものだった。非物質世界そのものが、荒んだ心に新たな腐敗した提案を囁きかけてくる。なので、それから解放されたことに心の底から感謝している。この命はあなたのものだ」

languages.text: “而这是我的荣幸，大人！我万分感谢您把我从前任主人手中拯救出来！身为伊斯坎多总督宫廷中的一员……这种感觉实在是让人难以形容。{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}亚空间{/g}本身始终在悄悄侵蚀他那不安的心灵，不断向他脑中灌输各种各样的扭曲想法，因此，您能把我解救出来，我对您充满感激，我的生命属于您。”
languages.original_text: "And that is glorious, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A thousand thanks to you for liberating me from my former master! Living at the court of Governor Iskandor is... indescribable. The {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} itself whispers ideas for new perversions into his disturbed mind. Therefore, I am infinitely grateful to be delivered from him. My life belongs to you now."

traits.locale_text: “而这是我的荣幸，大人！我万分感谢您把我从前任主人手中拯救出来！身为伊斯坎多总督宫廷中的一员……这种感觉实在是让人难以形容。亚空间本身始终在悄悄侵蚀他那不安的心灵，不断向他脑中灌输各种各样的扭曲想法，因此，您能把我解救出来，我对您充满感激，我的生命属于您。”

languages.text: "Und das ist glorreich, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Tausend Dank, dass Ihr mich von meinem früheren Meister befreit habt! Am Hof von Gouverneur Iskandor zu leben, ist ... unbeschreiblich. Das {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} selbst flüstert seinem kranken Verstand Ideen für neue Perversionen ein. Ich bin daher unendlich dankbar, von ihm erlöst worden zu sein. Mein Leben gehört nun Euch."
languages.original_text: "And that is glorious, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A thousand thanks to you for liberating me from my former master! Living at the court of Governor Iskandor is... indescribable. The {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} itself whispers ideas for new perversions into his disturbed mind. Therefore, I am infinitely grateful to be delivered from him. My life belongs to you now."

traits.locale_text: "Und das ist glorreich, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Tausend Dank, dass Ihr mich von meinem früheren Meister befreit habt! Am Hof von Gouverneur Iskandor zu leben, ist ... unbeschreiblich. Das Immaterium selbst flüstert seinem kranken Verstand Ideen für neue Perversionen ein. Ich bin daher unendlich dankbar, von ihm erlöst worden zu sein. Mein Leben gehört nun Euch."

languages.text: « Et je m'en félicite, Votre Seigneurie ! Merci mille fois de m'avoir arraché aux griffes de mon précédent maître ! La vie à la cour du gouverneur Iskandor est tout bonnement... indescriptible. L'{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} lui-même souffle à son esprit dérangé des idées dont la perversité dépasse l'entendement. Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point je vous suis reconnaissant de m'avoir délivré. Désormais, ma vie vous appartient. »
languages.original_text: "And that is glorious, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A thousand thanks to you for liberating me from my former master! Living at the court of Governor Iskandor is... indescribable. The {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} itself whispers ideas for new perversions into his disturbed mind. Therefore, I am infinitely grateful to be delivered from him. My life belongs to you now."

traits.locale_text: « Et je m'en félicite, Votre Seigneurie ! Merci mille fois de m'avoir arraché aux griffes de mon précédent maître ! La vie à la cour du gouverneur Iskandor est tout bonnement... indescriptible. L'Immaterium lui-même souffle à son esprit dérangé des idées dont la perversité dépasse l'entendement. Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point je vous suis reconnaissant de m'avoir délivré. Désormais, ma vie vous appartient. »

« Et je m'en félicite, Votre Seigneurie ! Merci mille fois de m'avoir arraché aux griffes de mon précédent maître ! La vie à la cour du gouverneur Iskandor est tout bonnement... indescriptible. L'Immaterium lui-même souffle à son esprit dérangé des idées dont la perversité dépasse l'entendement. Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point je vous suis reconnaissant de m'avoir délivré. Désormais, ma vie vous appartient. »

languages.text: "Pek şanlı bir haber {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Beni önceki efendimden azat ettiğiniz için size binlerce kez teşekkür ederim! Vali İskandor'un sarayında yaşamak... Tarif edilemez. {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Tindiyar{/g}, onun o rahatsız zihnine mütemadiyen yeni sapkın fikirler fısıldıyor. Bu nedenle onun elinden kurtulduğum için ebediyen müteşekkirim. Artık hayatım sizindir."
languages.original_text: "And that is glorious, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A thousand thanks to you for liberating me from my former master! Living at the court of Governor Iskandor is... indescribable. The {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} itself whispers ideas for new perversions into his disturbed mind. Therefore, I am infinitely grateful to be delivered from him. My life belongs to you now."
